name: ParaysteZArcade
description:
ParasyteZ Arcade is the arcade version of Parasyte Z game where you will battle an endless wave of the undead zombies for a fight of survival till death. Kill zombies and earn the highest score and show off your score on the online leaderboard. Top 6 players with the highest score will be displayed on the online leaderboard. 

5 variety of enemy types with different abilities.  4 different player weapons.  So Come on now and fight the zombies and beat the high score.
